titleStmt.title: Fiue and twentie lectures, vpon the last sermon and conference of our Lord Iesus Christ, with his disciples immediately before his Passion contained in the fourteenth, fifteenth, and sixteenth chapters of the Gospel of Sainct Iohn. As also vpon that most excellent prayer, contained in the seuenteenth chap. of the same Gospel. Preached by the reuerend and faythfull seruant of God, M. Robert Rollok, minister of the Kirke (and rector of the Colledge) of Edinburgh.
titleStmt.author: Rollock, Robert, 1555?-1599.

titleStmt.title: Fiue and twentie lectures, vpon the last sermon and conference of our Lord Iesus Christ, with his disciples immediately before his Passion contained in the fourteenth, fifteenth, and sixteenth chapters of the Gospel of Sainct Iohn. As also vpon that most excellent prayer, contained in the seuenteenth chap. of the same Gospel. Preached by the reuerend and faythfull seruant of God, M. Robert Rollok, minister of the Kirke (and rector of the Colledge) of Edinburgh.
titleStmt.author: Rollock, Robert, 1555?-1599.
Charteris, Henry, 1565-1628.
Arthur, William, fl. 1606-1619.

notesStmt.note: Editors' dedication signed: H.C. W.A., i.e. Henry Charteris and William Arthur.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
